channel.title: Two quick questions, friends =D
channel.description: 1. I don't have an ::item command in my server, I would like one...no clue how. 2. How do I make it so items appear on the ground that everyone can see (No you spammers, Not "Drop them")

item.title: Two quick questions, friends =D
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

[quote=“gfhfgh, post:2, topic:51805”]} else if (command.startsWith("item")) { try { int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (/*newitem <= 10000 && */newitem >= 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(newitem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.itemExists(newitem, absX, absY); } else { sendMessage("No such item"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad item ID"); }[/quote]
Thanks! I would rep you, but i need 5 more rep for dat.

Read full topic
